history.proof: intros x Hx Hopp. qsimpl time: 1. qsimpl time: 1 use: opp_neutral. sfirstorder depth: 3.

exceptions.tactic: assert (Hopp_x : Opp x = O) by auto.

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:
S: Set
A: S -> Prop
Mult: S -> S -> S
Add: S -> S -> S
I: S
O: S
Opp: S -> S
v: S -> nat

Goal:
is_ring -> forall x : S, A x -> Opp x = O -> x = O

Premises:
is_ring = commutativity S Add /\ is_group S A Add O Opp /\ intern S A Mult /\ associativity S Mult /\ distributivity S Add Mult : Prop
opp_unicity : forall (S : Set) (G : S -> Prop) (Add : S -> S -> S) (O : S) (Opp : S -> S), is_group S G Add O Opp -> forall x y : S, is_opposite S G Add O x y -> y = Opp x
opp_opp : forall (S : Set) (G : S -> Prop) (Add : S -> S -> S) (O : S) (Opp : S -> S), is_group S G Add O Opp -> forall x : S, G x -> x = Opp (Opp x)
regular_l : forall (S : Set) (G : S -> Prop) (Add : S -> S -> S) (O : S) (Opp : S -> S), is_group S G Add O Opp -> forall y z : S, G y -> G z -> forall x : S, G x -> Add x y = Add x z -> y = z
opp_com : forall (S : Set) (G : S -> Prop) (Add : S -> S -> S) (O : S), commutativity S Add -> forall x y : S, G x -> G y -> Add x y = O -> is_opposite S G Add O x y
inv_com : forall (S : Set) (Mult : S -> S -> S) (I x : S), commutativity S Mult -> (exists y : S, Mult x y = I) -> inversible S Mult I x
Fin.eq_dec : forall x y : Fin.t ?n, {x = y} + {x <> y} where ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map2 : forall (f : ?A -> ?B -> ?C) (n : nat) (v0 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (w : VectorDef.t ?B n) (p1 p2 p3 : Fin.t n), p1 = p2 -> p2 = p3 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map2 f v0 w) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v0 p2) (VectorDef.nth w p3) where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?C : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S ->...-> nat |- Type]
VectorDef.map2 : (?A -> ?B -> ?C) -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> VectorDef.t ?C n where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?C : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type]
VectorDef.fold_right : (?A -> ?B -> ?B) -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> ?B -> ?B where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type]
VectorDef.fold_left : (?B -> ?A -> ?B) -> ?B -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> ?B where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type]
Fin.cast : Fin.t ?m -> forall n : nat, ?m = n -> Fin.t n where ?m : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
VectorSpec.nth_map : forall (f : ?A -> ?B) (n : nat) (v0 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (p1 p2 : Fin.t n), p1 = p2 -> VectorDef.nth (VectorDef.map f v0) p1 = f (VectorDef.nth v0 p2) where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type]
VectorDef.map : (?A -> ?B) -> forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type]
opp_neutral : forall (S : Set) (G : S -> Prop) (Add : S -> S -> S) (O : S) (Opp : S -> S), is_group S G Add O Opp -> Opp O = O
Fin.weak : forall p : nat, (Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t ?n) -> Fin.t (p + ?m) -> Fin.t (p + ?n) where ?m : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat] ?n : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
VectorSpec.fold_left_right_assoc_eq : (forall (a : ?A) (b c : ?B), ?f (?f a b) c = ?f (?f a c) b) -> forall (n : nat) (v0 : VectorDef.t ?B n) (a : ?A), VectorDef.fold_left ?f a v0 = VectorDef.fold_right (fun (x : ?B) (y : ?A) => ?f y x) v0 a where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?f : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S ->...-> ?A]
Fin.L_R : forall n : nat, Fin.t ?m -> Fin.t (n + ?m) where ?m : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- nat]
div_O_O = fun H : is_ring => and_ind (fun (_ : commutativity S Add) (H1 : is_group S A Add O Opp /\ intern S A Mult /\ associativity S Mult /\ distributivity S Add Mult) => and_ind (fun (H2 : is_group S A Add O Opp) (_ : intern S A Mult /\ associativity S Mult /\ distributivity S Add Mult) => and_ind (fun (_ : intern S A Add) (H5 : associativity S Add /\ neutral S A Add O /\ opposite S A Add O Opp) => and_ind (fun (_ : associativity S Add) (H7 : neutral S A Add O /\ opposite S A Add O Opp) => and_ind (fun (H8 : neutral S A Add O) (_ : opposite S A Add O Opp) => and_ind (fun (H10 : A O) (_ : forall x : S, A x -> Add x O = x /\ Add O x = x) => conj H10 (conj H10 (or_introl eq_refl))) H8) H...
gcd_unicity_apart_unities : is_unitary_commutative_ring -> integrity -> forall a b d1 d2 : S, is_gcd a b d1 -> is_gcd a b d2 -> exists x : S, inversible S Mult I x /\ A x /\ d2 = Mult d1 x
VectorDef.rect2 : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A n -> VectorDef.t ?B n -> Type, P 0 (VectorDef.nil ?A) (VectorDef.nil ?B) -> (forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 -> forall (a : ?A) (b : ?B), P (Datatypes.S n) (VectorDef.cons ?A a n v1) (VectorDef.cons ?B b n v2)) -> forall (n : nat) (v1 : VectorDef.t ?A n) (v2 : VectorDef.t ?B n), P n v1 v2 where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type] ?B : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S ->...-> nat |- Type]
mult_O : is_ring -> forall x : S, A x -> Mult x O = O /\ Mult O x = O
mult_opp_r : is_ring -> forall x y : S, A x -> A y -> Mult x (Opp y) = Opp (Mult x y)
is_opposite : forall S : Set, (S -> Prop) -> (S -> S -> S) -> S -> S -> S -> Prop
VectorDef.caseS : forall P : forall n : nat, VectorDef.t ?A (Datatypes.S n) -> Type, (forall (h : ?A) (n : nat) (t : VectorDef.t ?A n), P n (VectorDef.cons ?A h n t)) -> forall (n : nat) (v : VectorDef.t ?A (Datatypes.S n)), P n v where ?A : [S : Set A : S -> Prop Add : S -> S -> S Mult : S -> S -> S O : S I : S Opp : S -> S v : S -> nat |- Type]
mult_opp_l : is_ring -> forall x y : S, A x -> A y -> Mult (Opp x) y = Opp (Mult x y)

```coq
intros x Hx Hopp.
assert (Hopp_x : Opp x = O) by auto.
rewrite <- Hopp_x.
apply opp_neutral.
destruct is_ring as (Hcomm, (Hgrp, (Hint, Hassoc, Hdistrib))).
apply Hgrp.
Qed.
```

original: intros x Hx Hopp. assert (Hopp_x : Opp x = O) by auto. rewrite <- Hopp_x. apply opp_neutral. destruct is_ring as (Hcomm, (Hgrp, (Hint, Hassoc, Hdistrib))). apply Hgrp.
